input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Hinged Pencil Tree KW750075'
  - Name='Vickerman 6' Natural Bark Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Artificial Pampas Christmas Tree Holiday Decor w/ Foldable Metal Base'
  - Name='Vickerman 24" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6' Unlit Artificial Canadian Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 3' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 18.5" Artifical Cypress Christmas Tree Unlit'
  - Name='Vickerman 42" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 30" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5' Red Slim Fir Tree'
  - Name='GDF Studio 7-Foot Noble Fir Pre-Lit Clear LED Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 7.5 Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Colorado Spruce 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-lit Dunhill Shimmer Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with Silver Tinsel Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Slim Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Hinged Pencil Tree KW750075
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a National Tree hinged fir, but a narrower pencil silhouette differs from the full-bodied Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6' Natural Bark Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but Alpine style and natural bark feature differs significantly from the full-bodied Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Artificial Pampas Christmas Tree Holiday Decor w/ Foldable Metal Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pampas grass design is very different in style and construction from traditional pine/fir artificial Christmas trees.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 24" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small size and likely different pine species representation makes it less comparable to a full 6-ft Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' Unlit Artificial Canadian Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and pine family tree but unlit and likely different branch and needle style than Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 3' Medium Mixed Classic Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much shorter and a mixed pine style, less relevant to a full 6-ft Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18.5" Artifical Cypress Christmas Tree Unlit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller and cypress style tree, quite different from full fir in size and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 42" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller size and different pine species reduce relevancy to a large fir tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 30" Carmel Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller, different pine style artificial tree, less comparable to full-sized fir.
Similar height and fir type but a slim silhouette differs from Dunhill's full-bodied shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GDF Studio 7-Foot Noble Fir Pre-Lit Clear LED Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in height, pre-lit and hinged branch structure, same fir type, very close to Dunhill Fir features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 7.5 Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and hinged branches but silver tinsel style and unlit differ from Dunhill Fir's green pre-lit traditional style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Colorado Spruce 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce tree is similar conifer type but smaller height and unlit style differ from Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same product as the reference with identical name and implied features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and conifer category but different tree species and potentially different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Pre-lit Dunhill Shimmer Fir Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with Silver Tinsel Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar pre-lit, hinged Dunhill Fir but features silver tinsel lights and is slightly taller, differing in color style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact match in name and brand, assumed same product or very close variant of reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Slim Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Dunhill Fir with hinged branches and pre-lit feature but slimmer silhouette and taller height distinguish it from full-bodied Dunhill Fir.
